_header: Though all the wood under the heaven that grows
_description: The wickedness of women: a companion piece to 2346 — one eight-line stanza

Banna.First Lines:
Thocht all þe wod vnder the hevin þat growisWar crafty
                    pennis convenient to wryte…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Cowld not wryt the fals dissaitfull dispytAnd wicketnes
                    contenit in a wyfe
